scripts.build-paths: rm -r build && mkdir -p build/ && mkdir -p build/vendor && mkdir -p build/jsorolla && mkdir -p build/css && mkdir -p build/fonts && mkdir -p build/img && mkdir -p build/conf
scripts.build-css: npm run build-css-jsorolla && npm run build-fonts-vendors && npm run build-fonts && npm run build-img
scripts.build-config: cp -r src/conf/config.js src/conf/tools.js src/conf/panels.js src/conf/icd10.js LICENSE build/conf
scripts.build-root: mkdir -p build/components && cp src/components/iva-settings.html build/components && cp -r src/welcome.html src/jso-styles.html build && cp -r src/iva-app.html build/iva-app-src.html && cp -r src/index.html build && cd build && sed -i '' 's#../node_modules#vendor#g' index.html iva-app-src.html && sed -i '' 's#../lib/jsorolla/src#jsorolla/dist/js#g' iva-app-src.html && npm run vulcanize
scripts.build: npm run build-paths && npm run build-jsorolla && npm run build-js-css-vendors && npm run build-css && npm run build-config && npm run build-root && npm run build-iva-app
